post.author: 이성기
post.content:
For Those who are preparing for Sun Certified Enterprise Architect (SCEA)-J2EE Exam.
Greetings,
It gives me great pleasure to inform you all that I've coded an applet based Mock Exam for SCEA-J2EE Part 1 and integrated into my website. Please visit http://www.harishramchandani.com
FYI, I scored 89% in part 1 and now going for part 2 and final part 3.
P.S. Indians can also enjoy Non-Stop Radio of Indian Songs on my website.
Thanks, Harish Ramchandani,
post.title: J2EE Exam.
